title: Bug 102623: Image can't be refreshed after importing again.
OB: The original image is still displayed after importing a new image into the layout again.
EB: The new image should be displayed after importing it into the layout again.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Import a new image named 'image1.jpg' into the layout. 
2. Verify that the original image is still displayed.
